Class Listener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.Listener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Expectable, Feasible<Class>, ListenAndExpect

    @Synchronized
public class Listener
extends Object
implements ListenAndExpect
    This listens for a specific ListenAndExpect, that takes an Class to check for specific actions

      • andWaitFor

        public final void andWaitFor(Class clazz)
                      throws InterruptedException
        Allows to wait for something.

        The something is defined by its class.

        Specified by:
        andWaitFor in interface Expectable
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class, that defines the type of the object to wait for
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if Thread.interrupt is called while waiting for the Object
